data.name: Hand Sorceress
data.description: A mystical healer who drains health when attacking.

starItems.name: Hand Sorceress
starItems.description: A mystical healer who drains health when attacking.

1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
Drain primary target for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of base damage

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + Drain for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of base damage.

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + Drain for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of base damage.

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + Drain for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of base damage.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
Drain primary target for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of base damage

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + Drain for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of base damage.

6.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage + Drain for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of base damage.

7.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + Drain for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of base damage.

1.description: Heal all allies for <color=#86e619>350</color> Health + <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>250</color> Healing 
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to the <color=#86e619>3</color> most injured allies

2.description: Heal all allies for <color=#86e619>600</color> Health + <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health. Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to the <color=#86e619>3</color> most injured allies.

3.description: Heal all allies for <color=#86e619>1,500</color> Health + <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health. Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to the <color=#86e619>3</color> most injured allies.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>400</color> Healing 
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to the <color=#86e619>4</color> most injured allies

4.description: Heal all allies for <color=#86e619>1,900</color> Health + <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health. Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to the <color=#86e619>4</color> most injured allies.

5.description: Heal all allies for <color=#86e619>2,400</color> Health + <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health. Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to the <color=#86e619>4</color> most injured allies.

6.description: Heal all allies for <color=#86e619>3,600</color> Health + <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health. Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to the <color=#86e619>4</color> most injured allies.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>600</color> Healing 
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to all allies

7.description: Heal all allies <color=#86e619>4,200</color> Health + <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health. Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to all allies.

1.description: On turn, <color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for the next <color=#86e619>1</color> turn(s).

2.description: On turn, <color=#86e619>15%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for the next <color=#86e619>1</color> turn(s).

3.description: On turn, <color=#86e619>15%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for the next <color=#86e619>2</color> turn(s).

4.description: On turn, <color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for the next <color=#86e619>2</color> turn(s).

5.description: On turn, <color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for the next <color=#86e619>2</color> turn(s).
